availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Conklin (Grayson County, Kentucky, attorney and politician)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Cunningham Conklin. Father of Elizabeth Conklin, Ellen Conklin, William A. Conklin, John W. Conklin, and James Conklin. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Grayson County in 1841 and 1848. Attorney in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1850. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Grayson County from 1861 to 1863 and 1865 to 1867. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Grayson County from 1853 to 1857. Attorney in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 78B.
